TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AssemblyNameProxy extends System.MarshalByRefObject

Docs.summary: Provides a remotable version of the `AssemblyName`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyNameProxy"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Reflection.AssemblyName GetAssemblyName(string assemblyFile) cil managed

Docs.param: The assembly file for which to get the `AssemblyName`.
Docs.summary: Gets the `AssemblyName` for a given file.
Docs.returns: An `AssemblyName` object representing the given file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This will only work if the file contains an assembly manifest. This method causes the file to be opened and closed.
